resources.string: Founded in 1993 by a group of young social development professionals, Integrated Development Foundation (IDF) is a Patna-based NGO advocating for social change, with field offices in Bihar and Jharkhand.

Our vision is an egalitarian society in which all community members can realize their right to a life of quality and dignity. This vision is guided by three operating principles: building local capacity, strengthening community institutions, and fostering community-based leadership. Our key strategies for creating sustainable rural development are using a rights-based approach and leveraging women empowerment. IDF projects are supported by UN agencies, national and international funders, and state governments. IDF is also the lead member of several state and regional NGO networks.
IDFs mission is to ensure better health, security, and well-being for the poorest and most deprived members of rural communities.
Integrated Development Foundation 101,103 Yashoda Apartment Panchwati Colony (Rd # 23) Lane in Front of Women ITI Digha Ghat, Patna - 800011
CLICK ON ICON TO VISIT US
